article.description: The owner of the oil well that exploded in the Gulf of Mexico April 20 made certain technical moves, such as skipping a cement test and not fully circulating drilling fluid, that made controlling...
article.title: BP Decisions Set Stage for Disaster

metatags.og:description: The owner of the oil well that exploded in the Gulf of Mexico April 20 made certain technical moves, such as skipping a cement test and not fully circulating drilling fluid, that made controlling any natural-gas seepage more of a challenge, a Wall Street Journal investigation shows.
metatags.og:title: BP Decisions Set Stage for Disaster

article.title: Updated spill stats bad news for BP, nature
article.description: The astonishing news that the oil leak at the bottom of the sea may be twice as big as previously thought could have major repercussions for both the environment and BP’s financial health,...

metatags.author: Brian Skoloff and Harry R. Weber,
metatags.og:title: Updated spill stats bad news for BP, nature
metatags.og:description: The astonishing news that the oil leak at the bottom of the sea may be twice as big as previously thought could have major repercussions for both the environment and BP’s financial health, killing more marine life and dramatically increasing the amount the company must pay in fines and damages.
